objects.specification: A neutral-colored front classroom wall with a smooth matte finish in a soft off-white tone, designed to be flush with the floor and provide a gentle background for mounted teaching aids.
A neutral-colored back classroom wall with a smooth matte finish in a soft off-white tone, designed to be flush with the floor and provide a gentle background for decoration.
A neutral-colored left classroom wall with a smooth matte finish in a soft off-white tone, designed to be flush with the floor and serve as a mounting surface for educational displays and a window.
A neutral-colored right classroom wall with a smooth matte finish in a soft off-white tone, designed to be flush with the floor and provide space for thematic murals.
A large teacher’s whiteboard with a sleek magnetic surface framed in anodized aluminum, featuring a bright, glossy finish that contrasts cleanly against the off-white wall behind it.
A flat, white-painted classroom ceiling panel that spans the room, providing a clean mounting surface for lights and projection equipment.
A compact, ceiling-mounted digital projector with a matte white housing and minimalistic vents, precisely aligned to cast images directly onto the whiteboard surface below.
A large, vibrant dinosaur-themed mural covering the right wall section, painted in rich earth tones and greens, depicting a lush prehistoric scene with detailed foliage and creature silhouettes.
A large classroom window pane with a clear glass surface set in a slim white frame, positioned flush in the wall to admit natural light and paired with fabric curtains.
A recessed ceiling point light with a diffused frosted glass cover, emitting a uniform cool white illumination for even classroom lighting.
A recessed ceiling point light with a diffused frosted glass cover, emitting a uniform cool white illumination for even classroom lighting.
